data.title: Anderson College of Business and Computing
data.meta_description: Anderson College of Business and Computing students positively influence our businesses, communities and world through an innovative curriculum.
data.text:
Skills to Succeed and Lead in Transcendent Times

In an era where lines are blurring between business and technology, the world needs graduates who possess a growing diversity of knowledge and skills, complemented by agility and purpose. This innovative college integrates business learning with computing, systems thinking and humanistic Jesuit values. That makes our graduates decidedly different – exceptionally prepared, resilient and imbued with the conviction to seek and make great change.

In our cutting-edge programs, our students and faculty – who have academic and applied industry experience – work together to connect with the marketplace and community to act as forces for change and progress. Our centers focus on information assurance, cybersecurity, economic and environmental sustainability, innovation, and common good computing.

Experiential learning opportunities range from starting new businesses in our Innovation Challenge or competing in the Rocky Mountain College Cyber Defense Competition. Students work alongside alumni and community members to hone the competencies that will lead to fulfilling careers and making a positive impact in the world.

Redefining Business as Usual

THE ANDERSON STEWARDSHIP PRINCIPLES:

Protect all living creatures and the environment.

Collaborate on solutions to society’s complex problems.

Focus on the lasting effects of decisions.

Understand the systemic effects of actions.

Champion inclusivity and putting others first.
